So in general you probably are seeing a pattern that's forming here. The answer for 5 objects
is answer for 4 objects into five. Correct? So answer for n objects in general is going
to be answered for n minus 1 objects times n. So for 3 it happened to be 2 into 1. For
4 it turns out to be 4 into answer for 3 which is 3 into 2 into 1. For 5 it's going to be
5 times 4 into 3 into 2 into 1. In general for n this is going to be n into n minus 1
into n minus 2 up to 2 into 1. So this is also called n factorial. What did we just
now observe? We observed that ways in which n people can take all possible photographs
happens to be n factorial which stands for n into n minus 1 into n minus 2 up to 2 into
1. Now this is a very important finding that we have observed and we're going to use this
in almost all of the lectures that are forthcoming from this onwards.
